column1: Uchi////I don't know why it's taken us this long to write a review. We have been going to Uchi for years
column2: both for happy hour and dinners. Our first date 4 years ago was here
column3: after which we have come back every 6 months for our anniversaries/half anniversaries and
column5: for our wedding dinner. Every time
column6: Uchi never ceases to exceed our expectations in food and service. Everyone is fantastic
column7: though we have a soft spot for Anthony
column8: who served us on our first date and every date thereafter for the next 2 years.
